item.title: Trump's pick to lead NASA made a big bet on crypto while going to space on the side
item.description: Before being nominated by President-elect Trump to lead NASA, Jared Isaacman guided his payments company Shift4 into the crypto market.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades a unique, AI-related stock, sees more than 20% upside
item.description: Shares of this artificial intelligence-powered marketplace may be poised for more upside in the coming months, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: UniCredit raises stake in Commerzbank to 28% as Orcel ups ante on pursuit
item.description: Investors are watching whether UniCredit will proceed with a takeover venture of Germany's Commerzbank or Italian peer Banco BPM.

item.title: UK inflation rises to 2.6% in November, in line with expectations
item.description: UK inflation data comes after wage growth quashed any last expectation for a final 2024 rate cut from the Bank of England.

item.title: 4 money experts reveal how to reflect on your personal finances â€” and set goals for 2025
item.description: Feeling guilt about how much you spent this year? Four financial experts have advice that could help you hit your money goals in 2025.
